front.title: Remote Network Monitoring Management Information Base Version 2

abstract.t: This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for managing remote network monitoring devices. This document obsoletes RFC 2021 and the RMON2-MIB module contained in this memo obsoletes the RMON2-MIB module at RFC3273 level.
